name: Layout Designer / HTML CSS Developer
description:
We invite a Layout Designer/Front-end Developer (HTML, CSS, JS), with work experience of no less than two years, to join the website support and development team in the Marketing department.

Responsibilities:

  • Website support on custom CMS: page and block layout, optimisation and editing of the existing layout (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery)
  • Blog support on WordPress: theme layout, editing, and optimisation, work with plugins/shortcodes/widgets (WordPress, PHP, JavaScript)
  • Layout of regular emails. It is vital that you have experience in email layout, know the details of table layout, and the peculiarities of postal customers
  • Landing layout, adding components on pages
  • Adding to and downloading data from CMS
  • Adding new information to websites

Requirements:

  • Be capable of finding various ways of solving a problem
  • Refactor, delete unnecessary data, proactively prepare solutions for the future, keep an eye on the accuracy of projects
  • Find comfortable instruments, deal with documentation
  • English proficiency (speaking and writing) is required for understanding documentation, correct naming of classes and variables, making comments, etc.
  • Get to the core of the situation independently, ask questions without hesitation, discuss solutions, and come to agreements
  • Work on tasks that have no direct connection to active development
  • Work with codes written by other people, sticking to the style

Technical stack:

  • Excellent knowledge of HTML, CSS
  • Advanced knowledge of JavaScript, jQuery
  • Confident knowledge of WordPress (work in panel, themes)
  • Good knowledge of Git
  • Experience in React, Vue

Will be a advantage:

  • Understanding of project assembly on Gulp
  • Basic knowledge of PHP and Twig
  • General understanding of work with Docker
  • Knowing various ways of deploying a server

We offer:

  • Attractive monthly salary paid in line with your skills and experience
  • A comfortable office in the center of Limassol (Cyprus)
  • Medical insurance for our employees and their families
  • Access to professional training, conferences, and paid educational courses
  • Corporate language courses
  • Evening yoga classes in office relaxation space
  • Subsidized lunches
  • Different corporate events for employees and their children
  • Sports events
  • Assistance in relocation and visa processing (if necessary)
